Trinity:

Trinity was in stasis lock inside the cr. Reparation process begun


--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Roland the Last Gunslinger" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> OOC: I'm the only one who didn't see Invasion, I guess.
> 
> BIC: Burning Hammer still lies unconscious...
> 
>   ----- Original Message ----- 
>   From: rAuq 
>   To: nbwrpg@y... 
>   Sent: Sunday, July 22, 2001 11:56 PM
>   Subject: Lynxiz - Lokk - Axis
> 
> 
>   OOC: Invasion was cool, Jer and I just watched it on ppv. =)
> 
>   --- Lynxiz / Axis / Lokk ---
> 
>   Lynxiz enters the Chivitron base, and heads for the CR chambers. 
>   Trinity was looking pale, but would likely survive the ordeal. As 
she 
>   enters the CR room, she spots Burning Hammer on the ground 
>   unconcious, "Burning Hammer? Uhh, hello?" She puts Trinity into 
>   an empty (obviously =P) CR chamber, and starts the process 
>   knowing that the small bot will be done soon. Then she turns to 
>   BH, "Hmmm, you don't look so good..." She kneels beside him, 
>   and examines him, looking for a reason for his unconcious state.
> 
>   Meanwhile, outside the Chivitron base, Lokk is still hiding 
behind 
>   the hill. He spots Windlord fighting close combat with Vampiza, 
>   and grumbles, not wanting to shoot and damage his fellow 
>   Chivitron. He picks out Apewing, and his twin chainguns unload 
>   half a clip each, hoping to surprise the bot.
> 
>   Axis peeks his head over the pod, and spots Speed Viper. He fires 
>   a laser blast, then arcs a missile at the bot. Then he crouches 
>   back behind the pod.
> 
> 
>   On 22 Jul 2001, at 18:02, Roland the Last Gunslinger wrote:
> 
>   > OOC: Mmmmmm YOU KNOW WHAT? ME TOO! WCW AND ECW! YES! WWF? BOO! 
WILLIAM
>   > REGAL AND TAJIRI HAD BETTER LEAVE WWF FAST BECAUSE THEIR SHIP IS
>   > SINKING! LONG LIVE THE ERA OF WCWECW!!! If you Wiiil, pardon me 
for
>   > making that strange OOC message, I won't kill you. I'm sadly not
>   > seeing Invasion, by the way.  : \  Oh, and we're not really 
such huge
>   > marks, we're just trying to have a little fun...

around,

unconscious for
